doc:
Maurice Tarplin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Tarplin 0 Maurice Tarplin (April 1, 1911, Boston, Massachusetts - May 12, 1975) was a novelist and a radio actor best known as the narrator of The Mysterious Traveler, employing a voice once described as "eerily sardonic." Maurice_Tarplin ( April_1_,_1911 , Boston , Massachusetts - May_12_,_1975 ) was a_novelist and a_radio_actor best known as the_narrator of The_Mysterious_Traveler , employing a_voice once described as " eerily_sardonic .
